creator: markus@brandstaetter.cc
text:
When the application server starts (Tomcat 4.1.24) and the application sends 
mails via JSPs everything works fine. After some time not accessing the server 
(seems to be more than an hour) sending a email using the same JSP results in 
the following failure:
2003-11-01 13:53:44 StandardWrapperValve[action]: Servlet.service() for 
servlet action threw exception
org.apache.jasper.JasperException: Access to default session denied
        at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServletWrapper.service
(JspServletWrapper.java:254)

This issue is effectively the same as #24715, and will be resolved by the fix 
to that issue (for which a patch is now available).

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 24715 ***
creator: martinc@apache.org
